title: Scout, Volume I
description: Scout, originally created by Timothy Truman and published in 1987, featured a Native American Apache named Emanuel Santanna in a post-apocalyptic United States. Now, this revered and powerful series is re-mastered and presented to a new generation! This volume features the first seven issues of the series, all featuring the writing and art of Truman, remastered and recolored for this volume!
author: Timothy Truman
